DOC.brief_summary: Development of a novel computer software that will assist in measuring the cup/disc ratio in digital stereo optic disc images.
DOC.brief_title: A New Reproducible Method of Measuring C/D Ratio of Digital Stereo Images of Optic Disc
DOC.criteria: Patients who attended the Glaucoma service Patients with at least one pair of documented digital stereo optic disc images Satisfactory Quality of image allowing Cup Disc Ratio Evaluation Unsatisfactory Quality of image allowing Cup Disc Ratio Evaluation Novel software technique unable to process or analyze the image
